Serialized Form

  • Package com.rikuthin.graphics

    • Class com.rikuthin.graphics.GameFrame

      class GameFrame extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • currentScreen
          Screen currentScreen
          The current Screen being displayed by the window.
        • gameLoopTimer
          Timer gameLoopTimer
          The Timer responsible for triggering the main game loop updates and repaints. This controls the frame rate and central timing mechanism of the game.

  • Package com.rikuthin.graphics.dialogue

    • Class com.rikuthin.graphics.dialogue.PauseMenuDialogue

      class PauseMenuDialogue extends Dialog implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • gameFrame
          GameFrame gameFrame
          Reference to the GameFrame
        • menuLabel
          JLabel menuLabel
          The JLabel that labels the pause menu itself
        • quitGameButton
          JButton quitGameButton
          The JButton that, when pressed, returns to the main menu.
        • restartButton
          JButton restartButton
          The JButton that, when pressed, restarts the game.
        • resumeButton
          JButton resumeButton
          The JButton that, when pressed, resumes the game.
        • settingsButton
          JButton settingsButton
          The JButton that, when pressed, opens the settings menu.

  • Package com.rikuthin.graphics.screens

    • Class com.rikuthin.graphics.screens.GameplayScreen

      class GameplayScreen extends Screen implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • gamePanel
          GamePanel gamePanel
          Reference to the GamePanel
        • infoPanel
          InfoPanel infoPanel
          Reference to the InfoPanel
        • keyStates
          Map<Integer,Boolean> keyStates
          A Map used to track the current state of keys pressed by the user.

          The key is the Integer key code (from KeyEvent), and the value is a Boolean indicating if the key is currently held down (true) or released (false).

    • Class com.rikuthin.graphics.screens.MainMenuScreen

      class MainMenuScreen extends Screen implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • backgroundImageFilepath
          String backgroundImageFilepath
          The file path String pointing to the image resource used for the main menu background.
        • buttonPanel
          JPanel buttonPanel
          The JPanel organized with a BoxLayout (Y_AXIS) that holds all the main menu option JButtons.
        • centreWrapper
          JPanel centreWrapper
          A wrapper JPanel using FlowLayout to ensure the MainMenuScreen.buttonPanel is horizontally centered within the screen's layout.
        • titleLabel
          JLabel titleLabel
          The JLabel displaying the main title of the game. It is placed in the MainMenuScreen.titlePanel and styled using UIConstants.TITLE_FONT.
        • titlePanel
          JPanel titlePanel
          The JPanel responsible for holding the MainMenuScreen.titleLabel and managing the spacing/positioning of the title at the top of the screen.

    • Class com.rikuthin.graphics.screens.Screen

      class Screen extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • gameFrame
          GameFrame gameFrame
          The parent GameFrame to which this screen belongs

  • Package com.rikuthin.graphics.screens.subpanels

    • Class com.rikuthin.graphics.screens.subpanels.GamePanel

      class GamePanel extends Subpanel implements Serializable

    • Class com.rikuthin.graphics.screens.subpanels.InfoPanel

      class InfoPanel extends Subpanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • bombCounterPanel
          JPanel bombCounterPanel
          A JPanel dedicated to rendering and displaying the player's remaining number of bombs.
        • gameplayTimerLabel
          JLabel gameplayTimerLabel
          The JLabel that displays the formatted elapsed time since the game started (e.g., HH:MM.SS).
        • highscoreLabel
          JLabel highscoreLabel
          The JLabel that displays the current high score achieved by the player.
        • hpCounterPanel
          JPanel hpCounterPanel
          A JPanel dedicated to rendering and displaying the player's current health points (HP).
        • infoTextArea
          JTextArea infoTextArea
          The multi-line JTextArea used to display static instructional information such as game controls and the primary game goal.
        • pauseButton
          JButton pauseButton
          The JButton used to pause and resume the game.

          It is configured to call GameManager.onPause(ActionEvent).

        • scoreLabel
          JLabel scoreLabel
          The JLabel that displays the player's current score in the ongoing game session.
        • waveCounterLabel
          JLabel waveCounterLabel
          The JLabel that displays the current wave number the player is facing.

    • Class com.rikuthin.graphics.screens.subpanels.Subpanel

      class Subpanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • backgroundImage
          BufferedImage backgroundImage
          The background image
        • backgroundImageFilepath
          String backgroundImageFilepath
          The file path of the image used for the background
